description.en-US: Display information about active processes based on various selection criteria.
description.zh-CN: 根据各种选择标准显示有关活动进程的信息。

description.en-US: Select all processes except session leaders and processes not associated with a terminal.
description.zh-CN: 选择所有进程，排除会话领导者和未关联终端的进程。

description.en-US: Select all processes except session leaders.
description.zh-CN: 选择所有进程，排除会话领导者。

description.en-US: Select all processes, including session leaders (obsolete).
description.zh-CN: 选择所有进程，包括会话领导者（已过时）。

description.en-US: Select all processes except those fulfilling the specified conditions.
description.zh-CN: 选择所有进程，排除满足指定条件的进程。

description.en-US: Select all processes associated with the specified terminal.
description.zh-CN: 选择与指定终端关联的所有进程。

description.en-US: Restrict the selection to only running processes.
description.zh-CN: 将选择限制为仅运行中的进程。

description.en-US: List all processes, lifting the BSD-style 'must have a tty' restriction.
description.zh-CN: 列出所有进程，解除 BSD 风格的“必须有终端”限制。
